dialogues.text: Alright, enough with the goo-goo eyes. She looks at the sensor, all business.

dialogues.speaker: CALHOUN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (climbing out of the tree) Argh, we lost the cy-bug. Let’s go. Come on, we’ll get a better view from the air. Think you can fix that shuttle?

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: Can do. He follows back her towards the shuttle. Down below the tree, unbeknownst to them, something has burrowed into the ground. We recognize the sounds of a cy coming from the hole it made. We see a Cy Bug emerge from the hole. It eats a candy can and becomes striped.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An impressive facility shaped like a giant cake. Birthday candle chimneys line the top. Ralph and Vanellope sneak p a guard's booth with BEARD PAPA snoozing inside of it. EXT. BAKERY WALL — MOMENTS LATER They slink up to a giant door with a hefty dead-bolt on i Vanellope’s face is painted huge on the door with a circl slash through it and the words: “No Glitches Allowed!”

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Alright, do your thing, knuckles. Bust it open.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: What’s this? You are a full on criminal, aren’t you?

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Hey, we shook on it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph's fist busts through the door, destroying it.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Thank you, Jeeves. Vanellope runs in. It’s dark. There’s nothing but a start button.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: What is this place? Where are the karts? She hits the START BUTTON. A screen lights up. It reads: CHOOSE YOUR KART. There are a bunch of cool candy karts t choose from.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: We gotta make one.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: What? No, no no. Look, kid, bad idea, trust me. I don’t make things, I break things.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Looks like you'll be stepping outside your comfort zone then, Gladys. (seeing a kart she likes) Ooh, this is a good one. She presses the “choose” button. Suddenly the entire plac lights up. There are levers and pulleys and bins.

dialogues.speaker: GAME VOICE
dialogues.text: Welcome to the BAKERY. Let’s bake a kart.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: What is this, another game?

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Yeah, well, it’s a mini game.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE
dialogues.text: You have one minute to win it.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Come on, Ralph!

dialogues.speaker: VOICE
dialogues.text: Go! Oversized numbers fly through air from the background to foreground. Vanellope runs over to giant steering wheel. Before her: shoots, a balancing platform, a bowl, and a trash can.

dialogues.speaker: MIXING
dialogues.text: The word “MIXING” flies through the air and knocks Ralph the head.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Put the ingredients in the bowl and throw away the trash. Vanellope hangs on the wheel to steer it. Egg come out of shoot and onto the platform. She steers the wheel. The platform tilts to drop the eggs in the batter bowl. Other objects come out of the shoots like boots, soccer balls, underpants, and hairbrushes. A recipe card keeps score. Vanellope’s having trouble wit the steering and is missing the ingredients.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Hair brush, no. Underpants. No, no! (frustrated) You're getting it all wrong, kid!

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: I’m trying! The clock reads: 45 seconds.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Urgh. I’11 do it. He jumps up on the platform, catches all the ingredients, throws the good ones into the bowl and the bad ones all o the floor.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: No... yes... gross.. Milk, yes, yes! The flour hits him. He falls into the batter. The beaters comes down and mix the batter, Ralph and all.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE
dialogues.text: Batter up! The batter and Ralph dump into a mold. Ralph crawls out o the batter just before it goes into the oven.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Come on, no sleeping on the job.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE
dialogues.text: Baking! Ralph gets up, stumbles around, dizzy. The word “BAKING” flies through the air and clocks him. UMPH.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Pump up the heat and hold the perfect temperature. Vanellope runs over and jumps on the bellows. She can’t g it hot enough.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Ralph! A little help here.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: I’m on it! Ralph jumps on it. He completely breaks the bellows.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Ralph!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Yeah, no problem, just give me this thing here-- Ralph grabs the hose and blows into it himself. The mercu rises.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Okay, good! A little more. That’s it! Hold it! Hold it! Hold it! His cheeks are bulging. He turns red...then purple...then blue. DING! Vanellope cheers. Ralph collapses. VANELLOPE (CONT’D) Yes! Come on, get up, Ralph! Fifteen seconds! The door opens. The kart slides onto a conveyor belt.

dialogues.speaker: DECORATING
dialogues.text: Ralph manages to duck under the “DECORATING” word. The conveyor belt goes under a bunch of candy dispensers filled with everything from wheels to jimmies. They must

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: launch eggs off of a spatula aimed at targets on the respective bins.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Wheels first.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: How many?

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: FOUR, doi!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Got it. Ralph hits the spatula four times hard. Four eggs launch, the target and four wheels pop out of the bin.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Now frosting. A buttload of frosting!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: No problem. He hits the spatula several times. Several eggs go flying smash the entire bin, which dumps all of its frosting ont the kart. Then the entire bin tips, knocks the next bin. The bins collapse like dominoes and dump all the ingredients down the kart.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Uh oh. The final buzzer sounds. The kart drops down a ramp into a fancy garage.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE
dialogues.text: Times up. They run to the garage door, on which there’s a beautiful image of a perfect kart. The garage door opens, revealing their abomination beneath it.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Congratulations. You did it. And here’s your kart! Vanellope stares wide-eyed at the kart,.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Aye yi yi. Look, kid...I tried to warn you, I can’t make things, I just break--

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: I love it!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: You do?

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: I love it. I LOVE IT! I LOVE IT! Look, it’s got a real engine, and look at these wheels. (kisses the wheels) I love it! I finally have a real kart! She hugs the kart. Ralph grins, pleased. Vanellope then grabs two small pastry bags. VANELLOPE (CONT ’D) Come on. A work of art like this must be signed. BACK OUTSIDE: Beard Papa wakes with a start. He sees Vanellope on the security camera. Beard Papa GASP He grabs his Red emergency phone.

dialogues.speaker: BEARD PAPA
dialogues.text: This is Beard Papa. The glitch is in the bakery! Get me King Candy. cur TO: BACK INSIDE THE BAKERY: Ralph and Vanellope finish puttin their names on the kart and stand back to admire their wo Ralph’s smiling like a sap-- the first we've seen him smi

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Whoa. You have teeth? I’ve never seen you smile before.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: I’m not smiling. I’m gassy, okay? They start to crack up, when:

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Hold it right there, glitch!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: King Candy, Wynnchel, and Duncan drive in. King Candy see Ralph and GASPS in shock!

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (seeing Ralph) And Wreck-it Ralph?!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Uh-oh. Ralph aims the pastry bag at King Candy and the donuts an sprays them in the face, temporarily blinding them.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Start the kart! Ralph throws Vanellope in the driver’s seat of her kart a hops on the back.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Start the kart.... She fiddles with the buttons and knobs but nothing happen

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What are you waiting for?! C’mon, let’s go?!

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: I... ah. I don’t know how to drive a real kart.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: You don’t what?! Duncan looks at King Candy, concerned.

dialogues.speaker: DUNCAN
dialogues.text: Are you hurt, Sire?

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY
dialogues.text: No, he just glazed me! Get them! Ralph pushes off the floor with his hands. The kart takes off.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Gang way!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EXT. BAKERY — CONTINUOUS Ralph and Vanellope burst right through the wall. Ralph h pedals the ground faster. They catch a downhill and pick speed. King Candy and the donuts are hot on their trail.

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY
dialogues.text: Stop in the name of the king, that’s me!

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Get off the road! Ralph digs into the ground and takes a tight turn. The CL swat truck over-shoots and goes tumbling. VANELLOPE (CONT’D) Head for Diet Cola Mountain! They take a fork in the road. VANELLOPE (CONT’D) Drive into the wall!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: What?!

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Right there, between the two sugar- free lollipops!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Are you crazy?!

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Just do it! Ralph aims the kart at the mountain head on! And just as brace for impact, Ralph, Vanellope, and the kart hit the mountain wall, pixelate, and disappear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph and Vanellope come sweeping into a Dali-esque world half-built game props. They CRASH. The kart ends up verti against a rock, front wheels spinning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: King Candy and the donut police screech to a halt. King C removes his goggles and looks around.

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY
dialogues.text: Where'd they go? Find that glitch. Destroy that kart. She can’t be allowed to race. Wynnchel and Duncan drive off. King Candy wipes his sweat brow, upset.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph picks himself up and lays into Vanellope.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Let me get this straight; you don’t know how to drive.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Well no, not technically. But I just thought-- Ralph gets to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: What did you think?! (mocking voice) Oh, I'll just magically win the race just because I really want to! She grabs the steering wheel, eager.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Look wise guy, I know I’m a racer. I can feel it in my code.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: That's it, I’m never getting my medal back. Vanellope jumps up and tries to push the kart off the roc It doesn’t budge.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: What is the big whoop about that crummy medal anyway?

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: The big whoop? Well this may come as a shock to you, but in my game, I’m the bad guy, and I live in the garbage.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Cool.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: No, not cool. Unhygienic. And lonely. And boring. But that “crummy medal” was gonna change all that. I go home with that baby around my neck, and I'll get a penthouse. Pies. Ice sculptures. Fireworks... (off her blank stare) ..-Ah, it’s grown up stuff. You wouldn’t understand.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: No, I get it. That’s exactly what racing would do for me. She goes back to trying to push the kart off the rock.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Well, guess what?

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: News flash! Neither one of us is getting what we want. Ralph stomps his foot. BOOM! Something explodes nearby.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What was that? Ralph follows the sound. He comes to a room with a bubbling pool. He reads the sig

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (reading) “Diet cola hot springs. Watch out for falling Mentos?”

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Yeah, check it out. Look! Vanellope throws a rock at the stalactite. Hits it. A pie of Mentos falls into the pool. BOOM! A giant broiling gey shoots up into the air. VANELLOPE (CONT’D) Oh, you gotta watch out for the splash. That stuff’s broiling hot.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Yeah, I got that, thank you. What is this dump?

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: I think it’s some sort of unfinished bonus level. Yeah, it’s pretty cool, huh? I found that secret opening, and now I live here. See, look, look look! She runs over to a crudely fashioned lean-to above a bed candy-wrappers. VANELLOPE (CONT’D) Welcome to my home! I sleep in these candy wrappers. I bundle myself up like a little homeless lady... Suddenly, it occurs to Ralph: their plights are the same.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: By yourself, with all this garbage around you?

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Well, yeah. I mean everyone here says I’m just a mistake, and that I wasn’t even supposed to exist. What do you expect?

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Listen, kid... I know it’s none of my business, but why do you even stick around this game?

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: You really don’t know anything, do you? Glitches can’t leave their games. It’s one of the joys of being me. Ralph looks around at her sad life. He gets a thought. He raises his giant fist and starts pounding the twisted, nonsense architecture. VANELLOPE (CONT’D) Hey! What are you doing?! Come on! I know it’s a dump, but it’s all I got!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: (still pounding) If you’re going to be a racer, you have to learn how to drive, and you can’t do that without a track. REVEAL: He’s made a beginner’s track around the hot sprin

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Whoa. Ralph picks up the kart and puts it on the track.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Alright now, let’s hustle up. We got some driving to do. Vanellope runs in a circle around Ralph and the kart, cheering.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: I’m gonna learn to drive! I’m gonna learn to drive! I’m gonna--Wait. Do you know how to drive?

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Yeah! I mean, I haven’t done it, but look, I flew a spaceship today, okay?

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: You crashed it.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Just get in. How hard can it be? Okay, uh... start it up. Vanellope starts it up and revs the engine.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: There you go. Okay, now--

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: There’s so much stuff in here!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Don’t start touching anything yet. Vanellope touches everything. She turns on the lights.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: What’s this?

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Them’s the lights.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: And what’s this? She hits the horn, holds.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: That’s the horn. Yeah, that’s still the horn.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: I like the horn.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Listen, we got work to do!

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Okay! She stops, focuses on him. He points to the pedals.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: So there’s some buttons on the floor...

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Pedals!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Pedals. Right. Now, that’s the Go pedal. That, I believe is the stopper. And this.... Wait. What is this? (pressing the clutch) It doesn't do anything. He picks up the kart, looks closely at the pedals, and st playing with them.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: What does this joystick do? She pushes the gear shift. The kart jumps forward, draggi Ralph with it. He lands flat on his face.

dialogues.speaker: AAOOWW
dialogues.text: Vanellope stalls. Ralph lifts his head up.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Good. Let’s try that again.

dialogues.speaker: JUMP CUT TO
dialogues.text: RALPH: standing in front of her. She zips forward and slams into Ralph.

dialogues.speaker: JUMP CUT TO
dialogues.text: RALPH: standing behind her. She grinds the gears, flies in reverse, slams into him. H cries out. She slams into him again.

dialogues.speaker: JUMP CUT TO
dialogues.text: RALPH: hiding behind a rock. Vanellope bucks forward, hits a tree. The tree falls, lan on Ralph’s head.

dialogues.speaker: JUMP CUT TO
dialogues.text: VANELLOPE: steering through an obstacle course. CUT to re Ralph is pushing the kart from behind, guiding her around rocks.

dialogues.speaker: JUMP CUT TO
dialogues.text: RALPH: motion-steering as Vanellope watches. She turns th wheel and slams into a rock. Spitting out a tooth, she gi a “thumbs up.”

dialogues.speaker: JUMP CUT TO
dialogues.text: VANELLOPE: driving in first gear. She lifts her foot off clutch slowly and moves forward smoothly.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hey, wait, you’re doing it. She shifts again.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Oh, I am.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Okay. Shift it again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She makes it around the track. Shifts perfectly.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Whoa! I told you; racing’s in my code! She drives faster...and faster.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Whoa, whoa whoa! Eyes on the wheel!

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Hey Ralphie, watch this! I’m going off road! She jumps the track then drives right up a steep, natural ramp. She jumps a part of broken track. Lands perfectly. She makes another jump. Perfect.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: I got that medal in the bag. She then aims for a giant jump...takes flight and....GLIT Her kart glitches about in the air, out of control. She’s headed right for the stalactite. She SCREAMS!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Look out! She ducks, but her spoiler hits the Mentos. She glitches again and crash lands on the track on the other side. Giant chunks of Mentos fall into the hot springs. Geysers shoot up. Ralph jumps out of the way of the boiling cola falling around him. Vanellope keeps spins out of control. She skids to a stop She looks spooked, but then she shakes it off.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: So, how'd I do?

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Um... well, you almost blew up the whole mountain.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Right, right, that’s a good note.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: You've got to get that glitch under control, kid!

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Okay, I will, I will! And then you think I got a chance? He contemplates.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: ...Tiny. She jumps up and around Ralph shouting--

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Yes! I’m gonna win! I’m gonna win! I’m gonna win! I’m gonna win!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: (giving in to her enthusiasm) Top shelf.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Top shelf! They fist bump.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. KING CANDY’S CASTLE King Candy paces in front of his kart throne. Sour Bill follows, waving him with a fan lollipop. The castle doors open. Wynnchel and Duncan approach.

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY
dialogues.text: (urgent) Did you find her? Tell me you found her. The donut cops shake their heads, no, solemnly.

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You didn’t? Go... leave me. The donuts leave. King Candy thinks, gets an idea, then storms off through door by his throne. Sour Bill hurries after him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INT. “UNDERGROUND” CHAMBER An elevator door opens and King Candy and Sour Bill step and walk along what looks like the insides of a wire. King Candy approaches a large door, upon which rests a ga controller. He types in a cheat code. The door swings ope King candy steps through it. INT. THE GAME’S CODE For the code savvy, it’s clearly a node graph. To the res us it looks like an electric spider web of glowing thread connecting an endless number of vault-like boxes.

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY
dialogues.text: Oh the code, the sweet life blood of the game. The boxes are labelled with icons and text, saying everyt from: “GOBSTOPPER VALLEY” and “CHOCOLATE RIVER” to “TAFFY MUTTONFUDGE” and “SOUR BILL.” The physics are different here, and so King Candy floats if in zero gravity. He drifts amongst the web, cautiously

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Where are you? Let’s see.... Stadium.... Jumbotron. There it is the “Winner’s Cup.” He double-clicks the box labeled “WINNER’S CUP.” The box opens. Inside floats a bunch of smaller boxes labeled “Co interconnected with threads. Amongst the boxes, one stand out. Its label says, “MEDAL.”

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: One of these things is not like the others. You! We’re going to give you a nice new home. King Candy slides the Medal box out of the Winner’s Box a along the network of threads. He arrives in front of a ve special box, connected with the most number of threads. I labeled, “KING CANDY.” He double clicks it. It opens and slides the “Medal” box inside. A string of ones and zeros gathers around his neck, then solidifies into The Medal of Heroes.

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Success.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He floats back towards the door. On his way he passes by box that is off alone, with no threads attached. It glitc Its label says: “VANELLOPE VON SCHWEETZ.” KING CANDY (0.S.) (CONT’D) Sour Bill, I’m going out. You’re in charge of the castle until I get back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cy-bug sensor is locked on the dash, scanning. There no bugs detected. Calhoun pilots. Felix stares at her, blushing-- unapologetically smitten.

dialogues.speaker: CALHOUN
dialogues.text: Your face is still red, you might want to hit it with your hammer.

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: Oh that’s not blunt force trauma, ma’am. That’s just the honey glow in my cheeks.

dialogues.speaker: CALHOUN
dialogues.text: Oh.

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: Ma’am, I just gotta tell you...You’re one dynamite gal. Calhoun reacts. FLASHBACK: Calhoun at the gun range, letting out a round. BRAD in the cubicle next to her, turns, impressed.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD
dialogues.text: Wow, you are one dynamite gal. FLASHBACK: Calhoun and Brad, sharing a Sunday.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: One dynamite gal. FLASHBACK: Calhoun and Brad having a flowery picnic.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Dynamite gal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FLASHBACK: Brad on one knee proposing.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Dynamite gal. FLASHBACK: Calhoun and Brad’s wedding.

dialogues.speaker: BRAD, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Dynamite gal. The glass shatters as the bug bursts in.

dialogues.speaker: SLAM CUT TO
dialogues.text: INT. SHIP — DAY, BACK TO PRESENT Calhoun snaps back to reality, upset, almost livid. She b the ship hard to the right. Felix goes tumbling. She lands the ship in the woods by the castle.

dialogues.speaker: CALHOUN
dialogues.text: Get out!

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: All I said is you're a dynamite gal!

dialogues.speaker: CALHOUN
dialogues.text: I said GET OUT! He climbs out. Turns to say something else, but the glass comes down immediately and the ship lifts off.

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: (distraught) Jimminy jamminy... He lumbers off towards the castle.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: EXT. KING CANDY’S CASTLE DOOR — SHORT TIME LATER Felix knocks on the castle door. Sour Bill opens the door

dialogues.speaker: SOUR BILL
dialogues.text: Mmmmyes?

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: I’m Fix-it Felix, Jr, sir, from the game Fix-it Felix Jr. Have you seen my friend, Ralph?

dialogues.speaker: SOUR BILL
dialogues.text: Wreck-it Ralph?

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: Yes, yes, that’s him.

dialogues.speaker: SOUR BILL
dialogues.text: Shoulda locked him up when we had the chance.

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: Locked him up? Sour Bill grabs a handle and pulls. A trap door opens and Felix falls in.

dialogues.speaker: SOUR BILL
dialogues.text: Not making the same mistake with you.

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: (falling) Oh my land!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vanellope comes running out of the secret door. Ralph pus the kart out behind her.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Come on Ralph! This is it. This is really happening. I almost don’t believe it. I mean, I have dreamt about it for so long, and now...now I think I’m gonna puke, actually. I mean I think I might puke. You know, like a verp?

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: A what?

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Vomit and a burp together, and you can taste it, and it’s just like rising up.... Oh this is so exciting!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Yes! It is. It’s exciting!

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: I mean, am I ready to be a real racer? Ralph, what if the gamers don’t like me?!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Who doesn’t love a brat with dirty hair? Come on, those people are gonna love you. You know why? Because you’re a winner.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: I’m a winner.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: And you're adorable.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: I’m adorable.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: And everyone loves an adorable winner!

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Yeah!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Okay. Come on. She laughs and hops in her kart. Ralph climbs on the back

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Listen to me: if you get nervous, just keep telling yourself: “I must win Ralph’s medal or his life will be ruined.” And have fun. Got it?

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Got it. Vanellope starts driving away, then slams on the brakes. VANELLOPE (CONT’D) Wait. Hold on! Ralph FALLS forward. She puts it in reverse, then stops short. He FALLS off the back.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Where are you going?

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: I forgot something. I’1l be right back. Vanellope runs back into the mountain. Ralph watches afte her.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Huh. kids...! He sighs, content. We hear the sound of a kart engine.

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Ralph, there you are! Hello! Ralph turns to see King Candy getting out of his kart.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: You!

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY
dialogues.text: Now, I came alone. Unarmed. Whoa-- He ducks as a boulder flies past his head.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: I’ve had enough of you, Pillow Pants. Ralph chases King Candy around a giant gum drop.

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY
dialogues.text: Now, calm down! Calm down!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: I’m gonna beat the filling out of you!

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY
dialogues.text: (putting on giant glasses) You wouldn't hit a guy with glasses, would you? Ralph grabs the glasses off of his face and knocks King C on the head with them.

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh you hit a guy WITH glasses, well played. Ralph grabs him by the lapels.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: What do you want, Candy?

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY
dialogues.text: For you to close your mouth. Your breath... Listen, I just want to talk to you.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: I’m not interested in anything you have to say.

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY
dialogues.text: How about this? Are you interested in this? King Candy holds up the Medal of Heroes. Shocked to see i Ralph drops King Candy.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: My medal. How did you--

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY
dialogues.text: It doesn’t matter. It’s yours.... Go ahead. Take it. Ralph takes the medal.

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: All I ask is that you hear me out. Ralph stares at the medal as he considers.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: .--About what?

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY
dialogues.text: Ralph, do you know what the hardest part about being a King is? Doing what’s right, no matter what.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Get to the point.

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY
dialogues.text: Point being, I need your help. Sad as it is, Vanellope cannot be allowed to race.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Why are you people so against her?

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY
dialogues.text: I’m not against her. I’m trying to protect her.

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: If Vanellope wins that race, she’1l be added to the Race Roster. We close in on King Candy’s eye and into his mind, where see Vanellope pop up as one of the nine daily avatars. A gamer selects Vanellope.

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Then gamers can choose her as their avatar. And when they see her glitching and twitching and just being herself... FLASH FORWARD: Vanellope glitching all over the track.

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: ...they’11 think our game is broken. We’1ll be put out of order, for good. FLASH FORWARD: The Out-of-Order gets slapped onto the Sug Rush console. King Candy’s subjects rush into Game Central.

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: All my subjects will be homeless. But there’s one who cannot escape, because she’s a glitch. FLASH FORWARD: A scared Vanellope is sucked into the vort of un-plugged oblivion.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Help! Somebody help!

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY, (V.0)
dialogues.text: And when the game’s plug is pulled, she'll die with it. We pull out of the FLASH FORWARD through Ralph’s eyes. He horrified by the thought.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: You don’t know that’ll happen. The gamers could love her.

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY
dialogues.text: And if they don’t? Ralph sits down, eyes still on his medal.

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I know it’s tough. But heroes have to make the tough choices, don’t they? She can’t race, Ralph. But she won’t listen to me. So, can I count on you to talk a little sense into her? Ralph contemplates, then gives a small, pained nod.

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Very good.... Now, I’1ll give you two some time alone. King Candy disappears around the bend. Ralph stares at th medal. He hears Vanellope returning. He stands, braces himself, and puts the medal in his pocket.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: I'm back. Did you miss me?

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Yeah. Yeah. Hey, can we talk for a second?

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Wait. First, kneel down.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: What? No, no, we really--

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Will ya just do it!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Ok. He kneels down.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Now close your eyes.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Vanellope.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Shush. Close ‘em! He shuts them. She ties something around his neck. VANELLOPE (CONT’D) Okay. Open ‘em up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks down and sees a small, handmade candy heart on a string, on which is hand-painted the words: “To Stink Bra

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: (reading) To Stink Brain. Gee, thanks.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Turn it over. He does. On the back is painted the words: “You’re my Her VANELLOPE (CONT’D) I made it for you, just in case we don’t win. Not that I think there's even a remote chance we’re not gonna win.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: (this is killing him) Thanks kid, Um listen--

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Now rise, my royal chump! I’ve got a date with destiny! (Ralph doesn’t move) Ralph, come on, move your molasses!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Um, I’ve been thinking--

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: That’s dangerous.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Who cares about this stupid race, anyway?

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: That’s not very funny, Ralph.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: No, I’m serious. It was really fun to build the kart and everything but maybe you shouldn't do it. That gets her attention.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Ah, hello? Is Ralph in there? I'd like to speak to him please.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Look, what I’m saying is, you can’t be a racer. Her eyes go down to his chest and she sees something.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: What? Why would you-- She pulls the Medal of Heroes out of Ralph’s pocket. VANELLOPE (CONT’D) Wait a minute. Where did you get this?

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Look, I’m gonna be straight with you; I’ve been talking to King Candy.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: King Candy? You sold me out?

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: You don’t understand.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: No, I understand plenty, traitor. She throws the medal at him. It hits him in the face and falls to the ground. She jumps back in the kart. VANELLOPE (CONT’D) You’re a rat. And I don’t need you! I can win that race on my own.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: But I’m trying to save your skin, kid! Ralph grabs her and picks her up out of the kart.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Hey! Put me down. Let me go! He sets her down. She immediately makes a dash for the ka Ralph blocks her way. She struggles to get around him.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: No, you listen to me. You know what’s gonna happen when the players see you glitching? They’re gonna think the game’s broken.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: I don’t care, you’re a liar.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: You better care, because if your game goes out of order, you go down with the ship, little sister!

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: I’m not listening to you! Get out of my way! She gets under his leg and gets back in the kart. VANELLOPE (CONT’D) I’m going to that race! He pulls her out again and holds her by the scruff. She thrashes and kicks at him.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: No, you’re not. He hangs her by her hood on the edge of a pointy gumdrop.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Take me down from here, Ralph, right now!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: No.... I’m doing this for your own good. He goes over to the kart and raises his fists. She strugg to get free, but can’t.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Wait. Wait. Wait. No. No. No. Please, Ralph! No! Stop! But he doesn’t stop. He destroys the kart. She sobs. Then she glitches and lands on her butt on the ground. The kart is in ruins. Ralph turns to her. VANELLOPE (CONT’D) (heartbroken) You really are a bad guy. She runs sobbing into the mountain entrance. Ralph hangs head. He sighs, then walks over and picks up his medal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He starts down the road alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph rides up on the push cart, wearing his medal. It’s awfully quiet. All the lights are out at the Niceland Apartments, but for a single light in the Penthouse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door hangs slightly open. Ralph pushes it the rest of way and steps inside. The place looks like it’s been loot

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Hello? Anybody home? Felix? Mary?

dialogues.speaker: GENE, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Well, you actually went and did it. There, by the bar, stands Gene, pouring one last Martini.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Gene? Where is everybody?

dialogues.speaker: GENE
dialogues.text: They're gone. After Felix went to find you and then didn’t come back, everyone panicked and abandoned ship.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: But--but I’m here now.

dialogues.speaker: GENE
dialogues.text: It’s too late, Ralph. Litwak’s pulling our plug in the morning. Gene motions towards the balcony. Ralph goes over and loo out. He sees the Out-of-Order sign taped to the console. GENE (CONT’D) But, never let it be said I’m not a man of my word. The place is yours, Ralph. Enjoy. Gene tosses Ralph the keys to the Penthouse. Ralph catche them and looks at them, upset, as Gene grabs his suitcase heads for the door.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Gene, wait. Listen, this is not what I wanted. Gene stops and turns back.

dialogues.speaker: GENE
dialogues.text: So what did you want Ralph?

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: I don’t know, I just.... I was just tired of living alone in the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: garbage.

dialogues.speaker: GENE
dialogues.text: Well now you can live alone in the penthouse. Gene leaves.

dialogues.speaker: DISSOLVE TO
dialogues.text: EXT. PENTHOUSE BALCONY — SHORT TIME LATER Ralph stands there, alone. He looks down at the Medal of Heroes. He shakes his head, disgusted, then throws it. The medal smacks against the game screen. The hit on the screen causes one corner of the tape on the Out-of-Order to release. The sign goes crooked. He looks out the game screen and sees the Sugar Rush cons across the way. It reminds him of the homemade medal Vanellope gave him. It’s still around his neck. He takes off and turns it to the side that says, “You’re my Hero.” He hugs it to his chest and looks back out at the Sugar R game. He notices something... There on the console’s side, are illustrations of all the racers, including Vanellope. BACK ON RALPH: That makes him think...then run off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sour Bill loads the scraps of Vanellope’s kart into a can wheelbarrow. A shadow rises over him.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Hey cough drop. Explain something to me... Sour Bill turns to see Ralph, looming, fists on hips.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: If Vanellope was never meant to exist, then why is HER picture on the side of the game console?

dialogues.speaker: SOUR BILL
dialogues.text: Uuhhhhbhh... Sour Bill makes a run for it. Ralph grabs him.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: What’s going on in this candy- coated Heart of Darkness?

dialogues.speaker: SOUR BILL
dialogues.text: Nothin’.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Talk.

dialogues.speaker: SOUR BILL
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: I'll lick you.

dialogues.speaker: SOUR BILL
dialogues.text: You wouldn't.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Oh yeah? Ralph gives him a quick lick. Sour Bill cringes.

dialogues.speaker: SOUR BILL
dialogues.text: That's like sandpaper.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Hmm, wonder how many licks it’1l take to get to your center.

dialogues.speaker: SOUR BILL
dialogues.text: I'll take it to my grave.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Fair enough. Ralph tosses Sour Bill in his mouth.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (puckering) Ooh-hoo-hoo. They call you Sour Bill for a reason. Sour Bill SCREAMS as Ralph swishes him around. Finally, R pulls him out.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Had enough yet? Sour Bill squeals like stoolie.

dialogues.speaker: SOUR BILL
dialogues.text: Okay, I’1l talk. I’1l talk. I’1l talk. Vanellope WAS a racer until King Candy tried to delete her code- As Sour Bill spills the beans... FLASHBACK: King Candy in the code room, tearing all the connections off of Vanellope’s code. RALPH (0.S. Tried to delete her code? So that’s why she’s a glitch! BACK ON RALPH: shocked.

dialogues.speaker: SOUR BILL
dialogues.text: Uh-huh.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Why is he doing this to her?

dialogues.speaker: SOUR BILL
dialogues.text: I don’t know.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Suit yourself. Ralph threatens to eat him again. Sour Bill throws his ar up.

dialogues.speaker: SOUR BILL
dialogues.text: No no no, I swear, I don’t know! FLASHBACK: We see King Candy floating through the code ro scooping up nodes of memory into a royal chest. He locks chest with a pad lock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SOUR BILL (CONT’D) He literally locked up our memories. And I cannot remember. Nobody can. BACK ON SOUR BILL: Arms still up, praying he won’t be eat

dialogues.speaker: SOUR BILL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: But I do know this. He’1l do anything to keep her from racing, because if she crosses the finish line, the game will reset and she won't be a glitch anymore.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Where is she now?!

dialogues.speaker: SOUR BILL
dialogues.text: In the Fungeon with Fix-it Felix.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Felix?

dialogues.speaker: SOUR BILL
dialogues.text: And that’s all I know. I swear. Now please don’t put me back in your filthy mouth again. Ralph licks Sour Bill, then sticks him to a tree.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Stick around.

dialogues.speaker: SOUR BILL
dialogues.text: Yes okay, I will, I will, thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Calhoun patrols the area. Her scanner goes off. She pulls her gun and follows the beep.

dialogues.speaker: CALHOUN
dialogues.text: Come on, I know you’re out there. The signal suddenly drops out. She hits the tri-quarter, frustrated.

dialogues.speaker: CALHOUN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Ugh. Saccharine-saturated nightmare.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tri-quarter suddenly goes off, loudly. She looks arou on alert.

dialogues.speaker: CALHOUN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: But-- where... The ground gives way and she tumbles into... A GIANT CAVERN: She grabs licorice roots to keep from fal into the nest below, full of hatching cy-bug eggs and can coated cy-bugs traveling in and out of long caverns.

dialogues.speaker: CALHOUN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (to herself) Doomsday and Armageddon just had a baby and it is ugly.

dialogues.speaker: CUT TO
dialogues.text: THE TIME CLOCK IN THE SKY: The arcade opens in less than hour. We pull back and through a barred window into... INT. FELIX’S CELL, KING CANDY’S FUNGEON A frustrated Felix calls out the dungeon window.

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: Hello! Somebody?! Anybody! Please let me out! He shakes the bars. One bar is loose.

dialogues.speaker: FELIX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What’s he say? How does he say it? (imitating Ralph) I’m gonna wreck it. He hits the bars with his hammer. They fortify, stronger.

dialogues.speaker: FELIX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh why do I fix everything I touch?! Suddenly, Ralph bursts through the wall.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Felix!

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: Ralph! I’m so glad to see you. Felix throws his arms around Ralph. Changing his mind, he lets go and turns away from him.

dialogues.speaker: FELIX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Wait. No I’m not. What do you have to say for yourself? Wait, I don’t want to hear it. I’m not talking to you.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Ok, don’t talk, that’s fine. But you have to fix this go-kart for me, pronto.

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: I don’t have to do boo...forgive my potty mouth. I’m just so, so, cross with you. Do you have any idea what you've put me through? I ran higgledy-piggledy all over creation looking for you. I almost drowned in chocolate milk mix. And then I met the most dynamite gal. She just gives me the honey-glow something awful. But she rebuffed my affections. And then I got thrown in jail.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Felix, pull yourself together.

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: No Ralph, you don’t know what it’s like to be rejected and treated like a criminal!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Yes, I do. That’s everyday of my life.

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: It is?

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Which is why I ran off. And I tried to be a good guy. But I’m not. I’m just a bad guy. And I need your help. There’s a little girl whose only hope is this kart. Please, Felix, fix it and I promise I will never try to be good again. Felix can’t help but be moved.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INT. VANELLOPE’S CELL Vanellope sits in a fungeon fortress. The door looks unbreakable. Silly pictures and games line the walls. Vanellope sits in the middle of the room with a “Glitch proof” collar and chains around her waist. BAM! Ralph bus the door down and pushes in her fixed kart.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: I know, I know, I know. I’m an idiot.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: And...?

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: And a real numbskull.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: And...?

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: A selfish diaper baby.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: And...?

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: A...Stink brain?

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: The stinkiest brain ever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Giant soda bottles pop and spray. The lids of the fan box fly off, revealing hundreds of spectators. The racers lin at the start. A blimp flies over head. King Candy stands his royal box.

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY
dialogues.text: My sweet subjects, I can without a pinch of hesitation assure you that I have never been so happy in all my life to say the following words: Let the Random Roster Race commence ! Cheers! King Candy slides down his royal banner. He lands his own kart. A MARSHMALLOW waves the checkered flag. And they’re off!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BEHIND THE STANDS: Ralph and Felix ride on the back of Vanellope’s kart, holding on for dear life, as she drives

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Remember, you don’t have to win! Just cross that finish line, and you'll be a real racer. As they enter the arena, Ralph and Felix jump off the kar

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: I’m already a real racer, and I’m gonna win! Vanellope speeds across the starting line. She’s in the r OUT ON THE TRACK: The racers enter GUM BALL PASS and must dodge gum balls the size of bowling balls. Adorabeezle Winterpop hits a Power-Up. Her kart transform reveals an ice cream cannon.

dialogues.speaker: ANNOUNCER
dialogues.text: Power up! She shoots a scoop of ice cream, hitting Jubileena square the face. ANNOUNCER (CONT’D) Oh, Ala Mode! King Candy hits a Power-Up. The hood of his kart opens an unleashes a canon. He fires three fireballs at Rancis and Minty, knocking them out of his way.

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY
dialogues.text: Have some candy!

dialogues.speaker: ANNOUNCER
dialogues.text: Red hots! Further back on the track, Vanellope passes Minty Zaki.

dialogues.speaker: MINTY ZAKI
dialogues.text: Vanellope! Vanellope then catches up to Taffyta.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Pardon me. Excuse me. Hot soup! Coming through! Lady with a baby!

dialogues.speaker: RANCIS
dialogues.text: It’s the glitch, it’s the glitch!

dialogues.speaker: TAFFYTA
dialogues.text: The glitch?! Taffyta pulls ahead and up the layer cake, lined with gia cherries. She passes Candlehead.

dialogues.speaker: TAFFYTA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (to Candlehead) Light ‘em up, Candlehead! Candlehead leans over and lights the cherry stems with th flame on her helmet. They turn into cherry bombs that bla as Vanellope glitches passes them.

dialogues.speaker: ANNOUNCER
dialogues.text: What’s this? Cherry bombs! Taffyta hits a Power-Up. Sprinkle spikes shoot out the ba of her kart and hit Vanellope.

dialogues.speaker: TAFFTYA
dialogues.text: Stay sweet, glitch! Vanellope glitches all over the place, out of control.

dialogues.speaker: ANNOUNCER
dialogues.text: Oh, Taffy-Whacked! IN THE ARENA: Ralph and Felix watch, aghast.

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: Oh no, she’s glitching!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Come on, kid. Get it under control.

dialogues.speaker: BACK ON THE TRACK
dialogues.text: Tafftya, Candlehead, and Rancis shoot into a giant straw. Vanellope glitches up the rear.

dialogues.speaker: TAFFTYA
dialogues.text: I told you. You’re just an accident waiting to happen! She suddenly glitches between the karts and ends up in fr driving straight. Shocked, the racers lose control and spin out, just as th tunnel spits them out over the sea. Vanellope lands hard on the ramp on the far shore, stunne and confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The rest of the racers miss and crash into giant cupcakes

dialogues.speaker: TAFFYTA
dialogues.text: (spitting out frosting) Waaaaaaaaa.

dialogues.speaker: CANDLEHEAD
dialogues.text: I’m a burnout!

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: (to herself) Keep it under control, Vanellope. No more glitching. IN THE ARENA: Ralph and Felix cheer.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Okay, kid, let’s finish this thing without any more surprises--UMPH! Ralph is punched in the face.

dialogues.speaker: CALHOUN
dialogues.text: Hope you're happy, junk pile. This game is going down, and it’s all your fault.

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: My lady? You came back.

dialogues.speaker: CALHOUN
dialogues.text: Can it, Fix-it. (back to Ralph) That cy-bug you brought with you, multiplied.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: No, it died in the taffy swamp. The earth shakes. Cracks. Cy-bugs burst out of the ground

dialogues.speaker: CALHOUN
dialogues.text: Bull. Roar. Ralph gasps in shock. BACK ON THE TRACK: Vanellope catches King Candy, passes h She takes the lead. BACK IN THE ARENA: Calhoun holds off bugs and ushers the crowd out of the stands.

dialogues.speaker: CALHOUN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Listen up! Head to Game Central Station now. Move it, let’s go, go, go! The spectators scream and hotfoot it out of the stands. Ralph sees Cy-bugs swarming the finish line, attracted to neon glow “FINISH.”

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: What? No! He runs over and starts punching them.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Get away. Shoo! Go on, go back to your game! ENTRANCE TO THE NOUGAT MINES: Vanellope enters the mines. King Candy takes a short cut. INSIDE THE NOUGAT MINES: King Candy sweeps in and rear-en her so hard that she spins out. He hits her again and her front end goes up on his hood. She tries to shift and get of his hood.

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY
dialogues.text: Get off this track! King Candy stands up, breaks the antenna off of his kart, whacks at her. She screams.

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I forbid you to cross that finish line! BACK AT THE FINISH LINE: Felix and Ralph continue fightin off bugs. Felix points to the jumbotron.

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: Ralph, look!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: (seeing Vanellope in danger) Kid!

dialogues.speaker: BACK IN THE MINES
dialogues.text: She and King Candy wrestle with the antenna. She glitches nervously, causing King Candy to glitch, too.

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY
dialogues.text: No, no! I’m not letting you undo all my hard work! Vanellope grabs King Candy’s antenna and WRESTLES with hi BACK IN THE ARENA: Felix and Ralph see it on the Jumbotro

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: Is that...?

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: No, it can’t be. ON JUMBOTRON: The more King Candy glitches, the more we l sight of him and get flashes of a creepy, familiar face.

dialogues.speaker: TURBO
dialogues.text: BACK IN THE MINES: Vanellope screams in shock.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: What? Who are you?!

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY
dialogues.text: I’m Turbo! I’m the greatest racer in this arcade! And I didn’t escape Roadblasters, learn code, and reprogram this game to let you and your obese warthog of a friend take it away from me! He aims for a wall separating a fork in the road. He’s go to ram her right into it.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: No! Stop! The wall gets closer. King Candy laughs.

dialogues.speaker: KING CANDY
dialogues.text: End of the line, glitch.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: -.-Glitch.... That’s it. That gives her an idea. The world seems to slow down as s concentrates. VANELLOPE (CONT’D) Come on. You can do it. Concentrate. And... Glitch!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She glitches. Disappears. Reappears to the left of the wa King Candy swerves, bounces off the wall, and heads down right hand tunnel. VANELLOPE (CONT’D) Sweet mother of monkey milk! I did it! Vanellope speeds off and out of the mines. King Candy, on other hand, speeds right into the open mouth of a cy-bug! BACK AT THE FINISH LINE: Ralph sees her coming. He and Fe have a path cleared for her.

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: There she is, Ralph!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Bring it home, kid! The finish line’s wide open! BOOM! Cy-bugs start bursting out of the ground on the tra Vanellope screams and swerves around them, aiming for the finish line. But a cy-bug bursts out right in front of her. She crashe into it and goes flying. RALPH (CONT’D) No! Ralph and Felix leave the finish line and run to her. Ralph scoops her up out of candy debris.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Kid, are you okay?

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: I’m fine, I’m fine. Let’s finish this race!

dialogues.speaker: FELIX, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Ralph, look! Ralph turns to see that finish line is completely over-ru bugs. It collapses.

dialogues.speaker: FELIX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I can’t fix that.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Let's go.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: But I didn’t cross the finish line!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: There is no finish line. They run out of the arena. ON THE RAINBOW: Calhoun shoots bugs.

dialogues.speaker: CALHOUN
dialogues.text: Everybody out! Now, now, now! Ralph and Vanellope come running up the rainbow.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Ralph, it’s not gonna work.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: We gotta try. Ralph runs through the exit with Vanellope on his shoulde but she’s ripped back into the game. RALPH (CONT’D) No!

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Ralph, I told you, I can’t leave the game. He tries to push her through, but she can’t leave.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Come on, get through, it’s got to work.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Ouch. Stop. It’s no use. Felix joins Calhoun as the last of the citizens leaves.

dialogues.speaker: CALHOUN
dialogues.text: That’s everyone. Now we’ve got to blow up this exit.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Just go without me.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: No, I’m not leaving you here alone. Ralph and Vanellope look out at the destruction around th

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: But what about this game?

dialogues.speaker: CALHOUN
dialogues.text: There’s nothing we can do. Without a beacon, there’s no way to stop these monsters. Ralph looks up at Diet Cola Mountain.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: A beacon? (to Vanellope) Stay with Felix. He jumps onto Calhoun’s cruiser. Wobbles. Steadies himsel

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (to Calhoun) Let me borrow that, lady.

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: Ralph, where are you going?

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: What I do best; I’m gonna wreck it! Calhoun steps ahead of Felix and Vanellope and shoots at advancing bugs.

dialogues.speaker: CALHOUN
dialogues.text: Fix-it, get behind me! Ralph flies off, through the air, most ungracefully. Bugs attack. He punches them out of his way, sways, almost fal Ralph reaches the top of Diet Cola Mountain and jumps off hover board. The crater’s center is like petrified Mentos (think Giant's Causeway). Ralph punches it with all of hi might. RUMBLE. INSIDE VANELLOPE’S LAIR: Small pieces break off the giant stalactite and land in the hot cola beneath. Bright glowi geysers shoot up all around. BACK ON THE CRATER: Ralph gives it all he’s got. The crat cracks all around. He prepares for a final blow.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: One more! SLAM! Ralph is knocked aside by what we assume is a cy-bu He slams hard into the rim of the mountain. He shakes it as we hear a familiar sinister LAUGH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph looks up to see he is face-to-face with a giant, monstrous King Candy Turbo Cy-bug mash up.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Uh-oh.

dialogues.speaker: KC TURBO BUG
dialogues.text: Hello, old friend. Like what you see? Be honest.... Because of you, I’m now the most powerful virus in the arcade. I can take over any game I want. I should thank you, but it’d be more fun to kill you. Turbo lunges at him. KC TURBO BUG (CONT’D) Have some candy. Ralph gets past him. Turbo grabs him, throws him back aga Ralph gets to his feet and dives for the crater. KC TURBO BUG (CONT’D) Get back here little guy. Turbo catches him by his feet and flies him way up into t air. KC TURBO BUG (CONT’D) Up we go.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: No! BACK AT THE RAINBOW: Calhoun struggles to fight off the c bugs as they swarm the exit. Felix pushes Vanellope behin him protectively.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Ralph! Calhoun runs out of Ammunition. She resorts to swatting a bugs with the butt of her gun, but they close in.

dialogues.speaker: CALHOUN
dialogues.text: Fall back! She and Felix fall back through the exit. Vanellope stand before the bugs, alone. BACK IN THE AIR: Ralph sees the bugs closing in on Vanell

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Vanellope!

dialogues.speaker: KC TURBO BUG
dialogues.text: Look at that. Your little friend is doomed. Let’s watch her die together, shall we?

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: No! Turbo flips Ralph around and catches him by his collar.

dialogues.speaker: KC TURBO BUG
dialogues.text: Guess, it’s game over for both of you. Ralph looks down at Vanellope, then looks to his goal, th volcano now so very far below him.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: (determined) No. Just for me. Ralph breaks free from Turbo’s grasp. BACK ON THE RAINBOW: Vanellope sees Ralph falling from su great height.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Ralph! A bug closes in on her. She glitches and lands on top of cy-bug. Glitches again and lands on top of another one, heading towards the mountain.

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: Vanellope! BACK IN THE AIR: Ralph recites the Bad Guy Affirmation on way down.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: I’m bad, and that’s good. I will never be good, and that’s not bad. Vanellope’s medal slips out of his shirt. He grabs onto i and hugs it to his chest.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: There’s no one I’d rather be than me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He slams his fists down on the volcano’s Mentos crater. I cracks all around. IN DIET-COLA MOUNTAIN: The stalactite falls towards the broiling hot diet cola. Ralph falls with it. This is it. Suddenly, Vanellope rides up the side ramp in a kart. She makes the big jump and catches Ralph on the hood of her k RALPH (CONT’D) Kid?

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Don’t worry, I got it under control! She bounces off the stalactite, and glitches through the other side of the mountain, just as the mountain erupts. The cy-bugs instinctively stop fighting. They turn and fl towards the geyser's bright light. ZAP! ZAP! ZAP! Up in the air, Turbo looks around at the other bugs.

dialogues.speaker: KC TURBO BUG
dialogues.text: You fools! Why are you going into the light-- Turbo looks at the light and his eyes suddenly bulge like entranced cy-bug. He flies towards the light. KC TURBO BUG (CONT’D) No, no. (laughs ) I must go into the light! He flies right into the light and is zapped. Ralph and Vanellope crash land in the chocolate river, sa

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: (laughs ) Chocolate? I love chocolate. Felix and Calhoun see it all from the rainbow.

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: You did it, Ralph! You did it, brother! He laughs for joy. Felix hops up and gives Calhoun an 8-b kiss on her cheek. A little ten-point heart rises up. She looks at him like she’s going to kill him. Yanks him up b

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: his collars and slams her lips on his. It’s worth ten thousand points.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Felix puts the finishing touches on the finish line.

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: All fixed! Ralph puts Vanellope into her own, dented kart.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: You ready for this?

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: As ready as I'll ever be. Ralph gives Vanellope a push. She rolls across the line. Sparkles flicker everywhere. INT. CODE ROOM: The threads flicker. Vanellope’s lonely b is suddenly attached to the giant web by dozens of thread EXT. SUGAR RUSH LANDSCAPE: The landscape resets back to a its beauty. THE POWER CORD ENTRANCE: The citizens of Sugar Rush flood back into the game in amazement. BACK ON THE TRACK: Vanellope rises up out of her kart, in the air, and twirls. VANELLOPE (CONT’D) Whoa. What’s with all the magic sparkles? A beautiful princess dress forms on her body. A crown app on her head, a wand in her hand. IN THE CODE ROOM: The memory box unlocks and strings of memory pour out of it. BACK ON THE TRACK: Vanellope’s eyes widen as her memory c rushing back. The faces of her citizens brighten as they remember, too. Sour Bill returns, a candy tree limb stuck to his back.

dialogues.speaker: SOUR BILL
dialogues.text: (kneeling down) Now I remember. All hail the Rightful Ruler of Sugar Rush: Princess Vanellope. The kids look to each other in panic; the horrible way th treated her coming back to haunt them.

dialogues.speaker: TAFFYTA
dialogues.text: (cool-headed) Hey Vanellope, you know all that stuff we said earlier, that was all a joke, you know that, right?

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: (a voice like Snow White) Tut-tut. As your merciful princess, I hereby decree that everyone who was ever mean to me shall be...executed.

dialogues.speaker: RACERS
dialogues.text: What?! No, please! They cry. They wail. Felix and Calhoun share a look -- th is getting creepy.

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: Oh my land!

dialogues.speaker: CALHOUN
dialogues.text: This place just got interesting.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: (back to her normal voice) Abhhh....I’m just kidding. Stop crying, Taffyta.

dialogues.speaker: TAFFYTA
dialogues.text: (a total mess) ...I’m trying... it won't stop.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Wow, so this the real you, a princess.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Ralph, what are you, nuts? This isn’t me. Vanellope concentrates and glitches right out of the dres and crown and back into her regular clothes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VANELLOPE (CONT’D) This is me.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Look, the code may say I’ma princess, but I know who I really am, Ralph, I’m a racer with the greatest superpower ever. I was here. I was there. I was glitching through the walls. I’m not giving that up.

dialogues.speaker: WYNNCHEL
dialogues.text: Pardon me for asking, but without a princess, who’s gonna lead us?

dialogues.speaker: DUNCAN
dialogues.text: Yeah, who?

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Uhhhhh ME. I’m thinking more along the lines of a constitutional democracy. President Vanellope Von Schweetz. Has a nice ring to it, don’cha think?

dialogues.speaker: CALHOUN
dialogues.text: Fix-it, Wreck-it, the arcade’s about to open. Let’s move ‘em out! Felix joins Calhoun in the shuttle parked by the finish l Ralph turns to Vanellope. She runs into his arms.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: You know, you could just stay here and live in the castle. You’d have your own wing where no one would ever complain about your stench, or treat you bad ever again. You could be happy.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: I’m already happy. I’ve got the coolest friend in the world.... (off her smile) And besides, I’ve got a job to do, too. It may not be as fancy as being president, but it’s my duty. And it’s a big duty.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Ha.

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: Ralph? Are you coming, brother? Ralph sets Vanellope down. They fist bump.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: See ya later, President Fartfeathers.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Au revoir, Admiral Underpants.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: And farewell, Baroness Boogerface.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Goodbye, Major Body Odor!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Hasta la vista...

dialogues.speaker: FELIX
dialogues.text: Ralph!

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: Alright, to be continued.

dialogues.speaker: VANELLOPE
dialogues.text: Yeah! Ralph jumps in the shuttle and watches her until the door closes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ralph sits amongst the usual BadAnon folk.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH
dialogues.text: So yeah, I’m taking life one game at a time, and I gotta tell ya, I feel like a new Ralph. The bad guys all clap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INT. LITWAK’S ARCADE Litwak grabs the out-of-order sign, just as Ralph rushes the game.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (IN GAME)
dialogues.text: I’m gonna wreck it!

dialogues.speaker: LITWAK
dialogues.text: Hey, look at that! The gang’s all here. False alarm. Litwak crumples up the sign. The Moppet Girl starts to pl the game. EXT. NICELANDER APARTMENTS — GAME PLAY: The same building Same game. Ralph falls in the mud. SPLAT.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Course, the job hasn’t changed. But the Nicelanders are actually being nice to me. The Nicelanders bring him a Penthouse cake. His ugly figu is on the roof of it with everyone else this time.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: And that got me thinking about those guys left without a game. EXT. NICELAND APARTMENTS: The homeless characters hang ou the windows and scream along with the Nicelanders as Ralp and Coily wreck the building.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: So we asked some of our friends to help us out on the bonus levels. And I swear our game hasn’t been this popular in years. The gamers, they say we’re retro, which I think means old but cool. INT. LITWAK’S ARCADE: Kids line their quarters up on the it Felix console while the moppet happily plays.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (IN GAME)
dialogues.text: We’re gonna wreck it!

dialogues.speaker: FELIX, (IN GAME)
dialogues.text: We can fix it! EXT. NICELAND DUMP — AFTER HOURS: The dump has a new sign reads “WELCOME TO EAST NICELAND.”

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Oh, and I decided that living in a dump wasn’t making me feel very good about myself. Dig Dug helps dig as Ralph builds a rudimentary home. Nea Felix completes a row of professional-looking homes. The homeless characters cheer.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: So I cleaned it up. Built houses for our new co-workers, too-- well, with a little help from Felix. INT. CHURCH DAY: Felix and Calhoun are getting married. R stands beside Felix as his best man.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: And guess who was the best man at his and Calhoun’s wedding? Old ham- hands himself. All the soldiers are on Calhoun’s side of the aisle. All Nicelanders and random game characters on are Felix’s sid

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Very elegant affair-- lotta grandeur. Not one bug.... And I'd be a liar if I said no tears were shed. Felix goes in for the kiss. Calhoun first glances up to t window, expecting a bug attack. The entire congregation c their weapons. No bugs. Calhoun kisses Felix. EXT. NICELAND APARTMENTS, ROOFTOP: Felix wins another med which lowers from the sky, as the Nicelanders take Ralph their shoulders. Ralph is on the roof. He watches Felix get his medal. It doesn’t phase him. He smiles and looks pretty darned cont

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: But by far the best part of my day is when I get thrown off the roof. Because when the Nicelanders lift me up... I get a perfect view of Sugar Rush. As they carry him to the edge of the roof, he looks out-- RALPH’S POV: Through the arcade, a kid is playing as Vanellope as she speeds through the Sugar Rush racetrack.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Vanellope is a natural. And the players, they all love her. Just like I knew they would. She tries to get around two racers, and with a glitch and flip, she takes the lead as the race ends. She wins! She holds out a fist to the gamer. Words on the screen sa “TOP SHELF.” The player fist-bumps the screen. Vanellope then looks over at Ralph and gives a little wav EXT. NICELAND APARTMENTS ROOFTOP: Ralph beams with pride. waves back.

dialogues.speaker: RALPH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Turns out, I don’t need a medal to tell me I’m a good guy. ‘Cause if that little kid likes me, how bad can I be? FINAL FADE OUT.
